entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
